segments.text: You know , you really ought to get a new pair of jeans . Those are falling to pieces .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But this is how I like them , Mum . They ’ re just beginning to look right .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , you ’ d better get another pair for work at least or you ’ re sacking on the spot .
segments.speaker: S1
